dmca.title: [ABUSE] [Fwd: [SUPPORT] Your hosting a site with illegal content]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, November 29, 2005 8:06 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] [Fwd: [SUPPORT] Your hosting a site with illegal
content]


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: James Erickson <jerickson@theplanet.com>
> Date: November 15, 2005 5:48:40 PM CST
> To: abuse@theplanet.com
> Subject: [ABUSE] [Fwd: [SUPPORT] Your hosting a site with illegal 
> content]
>
>
>
> -------- Original Message --------
> Subject:         [SUPPORT] Your hosting a site with illegal content
> Date:         Tue, 15 Nov 2005 13:25:52 -0800 (PST)
> From:         blank blankman <legal_dept_intake@yahoo.com>
> To:         support@theplanet.com
>
>
>
> ccucu.com warez site having pirated software
>
> ----------------------------------------------------------------------

> Yahoo! FareChase - Search multiple travel sites in one click.  
> <http://us.lrd.yahoo.com/

> WwtZm9vdGVyBHNsawNmYw--/SIG=110oav78o/**http%3a//farechase.yahoo.com/>
>

> James Erickson - RHCE/MCP
> NOC Engineer The Planet Internet Services https://orbit.theplanet.com

> The Planet Technical Support
> 214.782.7802    800.854.7679

> Dallas, Texas  75207

> Please do not respond directly to the sender of this message.
